venue.address_2: cross street Center between Chapel and Crown
venue.name: Bentara

item.description:
***ICC Color Management for Graphic Designers***

The event will be held on June 6, 2007. Please arrive at 5:45 pm for mingling. The speakers will begin at 6:30.

ICC color management was created to save time, money and prevent unwanted surprises on proofs and late night press checks. This mini- seminar introduces easy to understand color management concepts and ties them together with real world examples showing how the designer can unlock the power of this technology for themselves.

Kevin Muldoon of TrueBlueDot Fine Art Prints will give a brief overview of color management and turn the floor over to Gist & Herlin press to create a custom ICC workflow for monitor, scanner and desktop printer so everyone can see exactly how its done.

Craig Wermann, Color Manager of GHP Media, Inc. will talk about how designers and ad agencies can interface their color with the presses to ensure the best reproduction of their creative vision. He'll also share tips and best practices on how to prepare files for production.
item.name: Design/Marketing June Meetup - ICC Color Management
